Direct message the job poster from Acceler8 Talent
Zoey Abramson
Researcher at Acceler8 Talent
Principal SOC ArchitectJoin a cutting-edge technology company at the forefront of AI innovation. Focused on advancing deep learning and AI technologies, particularly in the realms of NLP and computer vision. Developing a fully digital in-memory computing accelerator optimized for Transformer-based models. With a chiplet architecture, revolutionizing AI inference, addressing scalability and performance challenges. Be a part of a team that has a track record of success in developing and commercializing silicon.As a Principal SOC Architect, you will lead the AI SOC Architecture Team. Your role involves shaping a silicon roadmap, driving architectural explorations, and collaborating on hardware-software co-design. You'll analyze AI workloads, design efficient neural network architectures, and contribute to our flagship products' development. This is an opportunity to work with a seasoned team and make a significant impact on the future of AI.Responsibilities:Lead SoC design and architecture to create exceptional customer experiences.Analyze AI workloads, identify bottlenecks, and propose improvements.Design and evaluate efficient neural network architectures.Drive hardware/software co-design efforts for various components.Collaborate with software teams to achieve development milestones.Contribute to architectural research and high-level simulations.Optimize customer workloads and evaluate performance.Present progress updates and contribute to publications.Qualifications:Minimum:MS in Computer Science, Electrical and Computer Engineering, or related field with 10+ years of experience.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to simplify complex challenges.Demonstrated experience leading SoC architecture or design development.Expertise in AI SoC architecture and requirements.Proficiency in performance modeling and modern deep learning.Hands-on experience with neural network architectures.Desired:Experience with specialized HW accelerators for deep neural networks.PhD in relevant field with 10+ years of experience.Strong algorithm analysis and programming skills (Python, C/C++).Passion for AI and adaptability in a fast-paced startup environment.Help shape the future of AI and making a global impact!
